TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性，這些屬性描述用於 Windows 驗證的服務認證。

span.span: Provides properties that describe the service credentials used for Windows authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供兩個設定。This class provides two settings. 您可以將 屬性設定為 `true`，以允許用戶端匿名登入。You can use the property to allow the anonymous logon of clients by setting it to `true`. 然後，您可以將 設定為 `Anonymous`，以避免將用戶端的身分識別洩漏給服務。You can then avoid disclosing the client's identity to the service by setting to `Anonymous`. - 如果將 屬性設定為 `true` (預設值)，服務就可以判斷用戶端屬於哪個 Windows 群組。If the property is set to `true` (the default setting), the service can determine the Windows groups to which the client belongs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAnonymousLogons { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowAnonymousLogons : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否允許匿名使用者存取 (僅套用至訊息層級安全性)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allowanonymous users access (applies only to message-level security).

value.span: 如果允許匿名使用者存取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if anonymous users are allowed access; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用繫結上的 Windows 用戶端認證時，系統預設為不允許匿名存取。When using Windows client credentials on a binding, by default the system does not allow anonymous access. 這表示只允許經過網域或工作群組驗證的使用者存取系統。This means that only domain or workgroup authenticated users are allowed into the system. 但是在某些情況中，它也接受匿名、未經驗證的使用者存取服務。However, in certain cases it is acceptable for anonymous, unauthenticated users to access the service. 在這個情況中，您可以將這個屬性設定為 `true`，以允許匿名用戶端呼叫服務。In this case you can set this property to `true` to allow anonymous clients to call the service. 可匿名驗證的服務會大幅放寬安全性規定，因此請謹慎使用這個設定。A service that enables anonymous authentication is significantly loosening the security requirements, so this setting should be used with caution. 請注意，這個屬性不適用於傳輸安全性案例，只適用於基礎繫結使用訊息安全性來保護訊息安全的情況。Note that this property does not apply to transport security scenarios and applies only when message security is used by the underlying binding to secure the messages. 如果使用 Windows 傳輸安全性，則此屬性不適用。If Windows transport security is used, this property does not apply. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何取得這個屬性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeWindowsGroups { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeWindowsGroups : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示用戶端所屬的 Windows 群組是否包含在安全性內容中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Windows groups that a client belongs to are included in the security context.

value.span: 如果 Windows 群組包含在安全性內容中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分案例中，瞭解使用者 Windows 所屬的 Windows 群組可以為授權決策提供有用的資訊。In most scenarios, knowing which Windows groups users belong to provides useful information for authorization decisions. 然而，如果 Windows 群組不是必要的，將這個屬性設定為 `false` 即可避免進行全群組的宣告擴展，進而改善效能。However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何取得這個屬性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]
